skill_e.tooltip:
Alistar tramples the ground, ignoring unit collision and dealing ? (+?) magic damage over 5 seconds to nearby enemies. Each pulse that damages at least one enemy champion grants Alistar a Trample stack.

At 5 Trample stacks Alistar empowers his next basic attack against an enemy champion to deal an additional ? magic damage and stun for 1 second.

skill_i.tooltip: Alistar charges his roar by stunning or displacing enemy champions or when nearby enemies die. When fully charged he heals himself all nearby allied champions.

skill_q.tooltip: Alistar smashes the ground, dealing 60/105/150/195/240 (+0.5) magic damage and tossing nearby enemy units into the air for 1 second.

skill_r.tooltip: Removes all disables from Alistar. For ? seconds Alistar takes ?% reduced physical and magical damage.

skill_w.tooltip: Alistar rams into an enemy, dealing 55/110/165/220/275 (+0.7) magic damage and knocking them back.
